items.name: Villa (Full Deep Clean)
items.description: Comprehensive top-to-bottom sanitation for villas, including floor scrubbing, window cleaning, and high-pressure washing.

items.name: Studio Apartment (Up to 400 Sqft)
items.description: Complete studio cleaning with specialized chemicals and high-end equipment for a spot-free finish.

items.name: 1 BHK Apartment (Up to 700 Sqft)
items.description: Thorough cleaning of living areas, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom for medium-sized apartments.

items.name: 2 BHK Apartment (Up to 1100 Sqft)
items.description: Full-service hygiene for 2 BHK units, focusing on high-touch areas and deep flooring sanitation.

items.name: 3 BHK Apartment (Up to 1500 Sqft)
items.description: Elite cleaning protocol for large 3 BHK homes, ensuring every corner meets our high hygiene standards.

items.name: 4 BHK Apartment (Above 1500 Sqft)
items.description: Scale-up cleaning for larger residences, deployed with a 4-member specialized team.

items.name: Party/Function Cleanup
items.description: Pre and post-event sanitation for banquet halls and convention centers with rapid response teams.

items.name: Office Space Cleaning
items.description: Regular maintenance of office premises, including workstations, restrooms, and common areas.

items.name: Full Day Helper (9 AM - 6 PM)
items.description: Dedicated housekeeping staff for 8-hour shifts to manage ongoing premises maintenance.

items.name: Housemaid (Full Day)
items.description: Reliable and verified domestic help for comprehensive home management and daily chores.

items.name: Baby Care
items.description: Compassionate and trained baby care specialists ensuring your little ones are in safe and nurturing hands.

items.name: Patient Care
items.description: Supportive home-based patient and elderly care services provided by experienced, empathetic caregivers.

items.name: Residential Security (24/7)
items.description: Round-the-clock manned guarding for residential complexes with visitor tracking and night checks.

items.name: Armed Security Briefing
items.description: High-level protection with licensed armed personnel, trained in military-grade crisis response.

items.name: ATM/Bank Guarding
items.description: Specialized security for financial institutions with focus on protocol adherence and vigilance.

items.name: Industrial Estate Patrol
items.description: Perimeter protection and access control for large industrial sites with perimeter mobile patrols.

items.name: Hospital Security Services
items.description: Specialized healthcare security ensuring patient safety, asset protection, and 24/7 emergency response protocols within medical facilities.

items.name: Technical Manpower
items.description: Provision of skilled technical personnel for specialized industrial and commercial operations.

items.name: Labour Supply Services
items.description: Reliable and verified general labour supply for large-scale institutional requirements.
